channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Brings “Manchild” to Life in Campy SNL Bedroom Performance: Watch
item.description: 🎤 Sabrina Carpenter slays with "Manchild" on SNL! Bedroom vibes on point! 💃 #SabrinaCarpenter #SNL #Manchild

item.title: Watch Jeff Goldblum join Charlie Puth for cover of Cyndi Lauper’s ‘Time After Time’
item.description: 🎶 Jeff Goldblum & Charlie Puth team up for a groovy ‘Time After Time’ cover! Watch the magic unfold! 🔥 #MusicalCollab

item.title: Shirley Manson’s Old Band Angelfish Announce Reunion Show To Benefit Palestinian Children
item.description: 🌟 Shirley Manson is bringing back Angelfish for a good cause! Rock on for Palestinian children 🤘🎶 #MusicForACause #ReunionConcert

item.title: Neil Young Announces Tonight’s the Night 50th Anniversary Edition
item.description: 🎸 Rock legend Neil Young is bringing back the magic with a special 50th Anniversary Edition of 'Tonight's the Night'! 🎉 #NeilYoung #ClassicRock

item.title: Haircut 100 Detail First New Album In 42 Years
item.description: Guess who's back with new tunes after four decades? Haircut 100 is coming in hot! 🔥🎶 #MusicNews #Haircut100Revival
